content: 0 1 inch between the pouch and the teeth otherwise you couldn t be able to close the zipper easily if necessary use pins to keep the zipper in place while you baste it picture6 it is easier to baste the first half of the zipper from top to bottom stop break the thread and then baste the second half from bottom to top stop hide the tails of the bottom stop into the pouch picture7 turn the pouch inside out sew the zipper to the pouch with thread of the same colour of the zipper with small stitches check that your stitches are not showing on the right side of the pouch when sewing the bottom stop it will be easier to sew right side facing do not sew the bottom tails those will be hidden inside the pouch picture 8 ficture8 if you prefer you can also stitch together the top tails of the zipper as you can see in picture 9 picture9 enjoy
